message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can be done!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more after rejecting your first offer.
You're not getting any more generous, Bob. This is my final offer!
You're not getting any more generous, I am!
You're not getting any more generous, Bob. I'm taking what's left!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Don't think you can just take the leftovers!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're really trying to take me for a ride now, Alice. I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm taking the rest!
